scripts.package: npm run build && web-ext lint --source-dir dist/firefox && web-ext build --source-dir dist/firefox --overwrite-dest && web-ext build --source-dir dist/chromium --overwrite-dest
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext lint --source-dir dist/firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir dist/firefox --channel unlisted
scripts.package:chromium: npm run build:chromium && web-ext build --source-dir dist/chromium --overwrite-dest
scripts.dev: npm run build:firefox && web-ext run --source-dir dist/firefox
